pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer has displayed an increase in incidence unparalleled by any other tumor in the last two decades, with a steady, more gradual increase in mortality rate. Current curative strategies are focused on the detection and treatment of early-stage (T1-2 N0 M0), clinically significant tumors.

metaData.source:
Quality of life of patients with prostate cancer treated with surgery or radiation therapy
